trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the server or the client cannot be reached for a previously specified period of time.
trans-unit.target: 在一段事先指定的時間內無法連絡到伺服器或用戶端時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> is thrown when a remoting call does not complete in the specified timeout time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>遠端呼叫未在指定的逾時時間內完成時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, which has the value 0x8013150B.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING，0x8013150B 的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> 使用預設的<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> inherits from the <xref:System.Exception> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> 繼承自<xref:System.Exception>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>類別：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Localized error message for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 訊息，指出例外狀況為何會發生的理由。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> inherits from the <xref:System.Exception> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> 繼承自<xref:System.Exception>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>類別：

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: The `message` string
trans-unit.target: `message`字串

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>InnerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>InnerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception must include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果必須包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>類別：

trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考

trans-unit.source: The error message string
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串
